sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-applicant-layout', templateUrl: './applicant-layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./applicant-layout.component.css'] }) export class ApplicantLayoutComponent { sidebarCollapsed = false; toggleSidebar() { this.sidebarCollapsed = !this.sidebarCollapsed; } } ðŸŽ¯ Job Portal - Applicant
